content: mug cozies - because it s fall ya ll these mug cozies were designed for a standard mug size they are easily adjustable for larger mugs - just continue to work in pattern until the cozy when placed around the mug is approx 1 5 from the handle the cozy is secured around the handle with 2 loops on each end have fun with color make them solid or change colors whenever you like i used multiple colors for some of these as i was using very small bits of scrap yarn and when i would run out i would pick another color i absolutely love these in a patterned or variegated yarn such as knitcol from adriafil the pattern contains 3 different style mug cozies have fun
